full_summary:
**Title/Titre**: Fire Inspections and Reporting Services for F Division (Saskatchewan) Facilities
===============

**Request for Proposal (RFP) number/ numéro de demande de propositions**: M5000-23-00508/A

**Posting Date/Date de publication**: February 7, 2024
**Tender Closing Date/Appel d'offres Date de clôture**: March 25, 2024

**Introduction**
---------------

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of Fire Inspection and Reporting Services for multiple locations in Saskatchewan. This contract will span a period of five years, starting from the date of contract.

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

*   **Procurement Number/Sire et numéro de l'appel d'offres**: M5000-23-00508
*   **Procurement Method/Méthode d'approvisionnement**: Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Limited Tendering Reason/Raison de l'appel d'offres limité**: Conditionally set-aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business
*   **Trade Agreements/ Accords commerciaux**: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and others. Please refer to the attached document for more information.

**Eligibility Requirements**
---------------------------

To be considered, the bidder must certify that they qualify as an Indigenous business as defined under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and that they will comply with all requirements of the strategy.

**Security Clearance**
-------------------

This solicitation contains a security requirement.

**Evaluation Criteria**
---------------------

A bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The respondent with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be recommended for the award of a contract.

**Submission**
-------------

Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per page one of the Request for Proposal (RFP).

**Important**
------------

Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Please refer to the attached documents for more information.

**Contact**
----------

For further information, please contact Shawn Balaski at (780) 670-8592 or by email at shawn.m.balaski@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Attachments**
--------------

Please refer to the attached documents for more information. [Links to attachments](https://canadabuys.canada
